work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.

work.responsibilities:
- Worked with our professional services to build creative solutions to solve client Reconciliation requirements.
- Design and development for:
Reconciliation rules generator for IntelliMATCH reconciliation applications suite
Application suite migration onto Azure
Design of RESTful service application interfaces for microservices
Containerization of IntelliMATCH application services
SQL DB schemas and procedures for (DIM, PIM) products
Design and implementation of integration data ingestion ETL/ELT tools for application suite
ISO-20022 ETL/ELT Integration application ISO-20022/SWIFT Message ingestion microservice (C#.NET 6.0-> RESTful, IBM MQ and Kafka)
- Products built with Azure Databricks
Design and implementation of reconciliation engines in Databricks, Data Factory
Banking and Securities Trading Reconciliation Data Warehousing using Databricks, Data Factory
Design of integration data ingestion ETL/ELT tools on Data Factory

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
